Text: RE Contacts for Calgary TripThanks a lot Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Thursday August AM To Stuart III William Cc Lambie Chris Subject RE Contacts for Calgary Trip Stuart Here are the names and phone numbers of the people you wanted Duke Brad Daily Mirant Russ Wilson Transcanada Greg Shea Currently being sold not likely to transact Aquila Canada Mike KardashDave Lake Dynegy Darren Marine Reliant Willian Wong Sempra Gracen Turnbull Engage Energy Canada John Krill Utilicorp Same as Aquila Others that might come and will at least advertise to the rest of the industry are AEC Storage Hub Dean Giesbrecht CrossAlta Gas Storage Vince Landry Unocal Trevor Caldwell Regards Jon Original Message From Stuart III William Sent Wednesday August AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject Contacts for Calgary Trip McKay I have reserved Buchanans for Thursday Aug I need to contact some marketers to tell them about the outing There will be some fooddrinks and a very short introduction of the FX products Please provide contacts for the following firms Duke Mirant Transcanada Aquila Canada Dynegy Reliant Sempra Engage Energy Canada Utilicorp and any other marketer you think will be interested Would like to start calling tomorrow Thx Stuart

Contacts for Calgary TripMcKay I have reserved Buchanans for Thursday Aug I need to contact some marketers to tell them about the outing There will be some fooddrinks and a very short introduction of the FX products Please provide contacts for the following firms Duke Mirant Transcanada Aquila Canada Dynegy Reliant Sempra Engage Energy Canada Utilicorp and any other marketer you think will be interested Would like to start calling tomorrow Thx Stuart
EOL Product Description and ConfirmationCarlos and Laurel have approved these Take a look and lets disuss tommorrow Gary still wants to go external by the end of the month W Stuart

Final Product Descriptionmade two small changes Unless you have any changes I consider this to be final Justin Please call me on the short description Sara Please finalize confirms and lets talk to Calgary on Monday AM about their counterparties WStuart
Foreign Exchange Postcard Cc Forwarding the language to appear on the postcard to take with me to Calgary I will need approx postcards made Thanks WStuart

Additional Currency Productshave been successfully transacting the USDCAD products on EOL We now need to add USDJPY products Garys timeline is weeks These will probably be USDJPY forwards with internal counterparties Sara I will send an email tommorrow with the product description Thanks in advance W Stuart

Counterparty List ISDA Agreementsforwarding ECT Canadas top counterparties We will use this list with the exception of J Aaron BP Amoco PGE Morgan Stanley and Bank of Montreal as our target list for the USDCAD products Please ensure that a GTC is drawn up to allow EOL trading of these currency products I would like to have the legal work done by March in order to meet Garys deadline David I talked to Goldman today They have developed a mechanism to feed live rates from their website into Excel They will be here in weeks to do a demo WStuart Forwarded by William StuartHOUECT on PM Jason Garvey PM To William CT cc Jonathan CT Subject ISDA Agreements

FW Legal documentation for online FX traderSara Resending the last email I have related to Barclays online FX trading Original Message From Koehler Anne C Sent Monday August PM To Cc Shackleton Sara Stuart III William Subject Legal documentation for online FX trader Zachary I have reviewed the terms of the various documents you provided to us relating to our proposed use of Barclays online FX trading site Attached are redlined versions of each of these documents incorporating my comments Please give me a call if you have any questions or would like to discuss any of our requested changes Anne

RE inthemoney positions for ENA Cc What is traded under J Aaron vs Goldman If J Aaron has liquidated why isare there a positions under Goldman Sachs Stuart Original Message From Glover Sheila Sent Monday December AM To Shackleton Sara Cc Adams Laurel Moran Tom Carrington Clara Shahi Pushkar Stuart III William Subject RE inthemoney positions for ENA is a dealsg Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Monday December AM To Glover Sheila Cc Adams Laurel Moran Tom Carrington Clara Subject inthemoney positions for ENA Of these positions where the counterparty has not terminated and there is only FXrate activity I find only Goldman Sachs Co Laurel and Clara are reviewing this one it may be repo activity I am still trying to clarify what we can be doing for inthemoney terminated positions We can discuss further at Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax

Important EURUSD and USDJPY Product Descriptions Cc I understand that in Saras absence you are the point person in legal to approve product descriptions The attached products are short simple and for internal counterparties only In order to meet our deadline the product descriptions need to be approved by Wednesday Thanks W Stuart
